DataElement.preferredName: Person COVNET Human Study Subject Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication whether or not the individual is a participant in the "COVNET: Large-scale Genome-wide Association Study and Whole Genome Sequencing of COVID-19 Severity" study that is designed to identify common and rare germline genetic variants associated with susceptibility to severe or fatal COVID-19 disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person COVNET: Large-scale Genome-wide Association Study and Whole Genome Sequencing of COVID-19 Severity Human Study Subject
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._A large genome-wide association study (GWAS) designed to identify common and rare germline genetic variants associated with susceptibility to severe or fatal COVID-19 disease._A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.

Property.preferredName: COVNET Large Genome-wide Association Study Human Study Subject
Property.preferredDefinition: A large genome-wide association study (GWAS) designed to identify common and rare germline genetic variants associated with susceptibility to severe or fatal COVID-19 disease.:A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.

Concepts.longName: COVNET: Large-scale Genome-wide Association Study and Whole Genome Sequencing of COVID-19 Severity
Concepts.definition: A large genome-wide association study (GWAS) designed to identify common and rare germline genetic variants associated with susceptibility to severe or fatal COVID-19 disease.
A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredName: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
